titleStmt.title: C. W. Foster, Special Orders, No. 42
CWG12503

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Union Artillery, Navy and Marines Primary Source Documents ; Misc U.S.C.T. Primary Source Documents
msIdentifier.idno: Box 14, Folder BTRY B, 2nd Battery, 1st REGT LIGHT ARTILLERY OFFICERS

body.p:
HEAD QUARTERS, DEPARTMENT OF THE OHIO.
Cincinnati, Ohio, January 22nd 1863
SPECIAL ORDERS,
No. 42
The resignation of 2nd Lieutenant Matthew H. Turner "Hewitts Battery Kentucky" Volunteers, is hereby accepted, to take effect on the (22nd) twenty second day of January 1863.
BY ORDER OF MAJOR GENERAL WRIGHT.

C. W. Foster
Assistant Adjutant General.
1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6.

Hewitts Batt:
Lt. Turner resig:
filed Jany. 24. 1863.
2nd
